content.text: I'm going to a book club meeting to talk about our favorite American novels. How's your day going?
It's going well! I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life. I'm volunteering at a local urban farm today.
Volunteering is so important! I remember listening to the radio with my father and singing along to the songs.
I love kpop. I prefer the night instead of the day.
I work for a large law firm. I'm trying to find a new job that will be a better fit for my personality.
I live on a pig farm. I have a small dog.
Oh wow! I'm not sure I've ever met someone who lives on a pig farm before.
I'm sure it is. Do you enjoy your job?
